item.title: Nebius Joins the AI Elite After a $17.4 Billion Microsoft Pact
item.description: An infrastructure agreement with Microsoft validates Nebius Group's technology and catapults the company into the top echelon of AI industry players.

item.title: Oil Shorts Are Crowded, 3 Names That Could Bring on a Squeeze
item.description: Positioning in the oil markets show a potential for a "pain trade" where a squeeze in supply could come about, spiking oil prices much higher

item.title: Part of the Club: Robinhood & AppLovin Soar on S&P 500 Inclusion
item.description: After a long wait, Robinhood and AppLovin are now set to join the S&P 500 Index. Shares spiked in response, with institutional buying ready to ensue.
